 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּזַז‎</span>] **verb** ==be supple, agile== (Talmud (rare) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּזִיזָא‎</span> ***hasty***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be frightened, excited***; Syriac (Lexicons) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***leap***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***agile***, etc.); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫פֹזוּ‎</span> [[Gen.49.24|Gen 49:24]], of arms. **Pi\`el** ***shew agility, leap*** (in dance), ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַזֵּז וּמְכַרְכֵּר‎</span> [[2Sam.6.16|2Sam 6:16]].
